results.definition: a state of being relaxed and feeling no pain
examples: he is a man who enjoys his comfort
she longed for the comfortableness of her armchair

results.definition: give moral or emotional strength to
the act of consoling; giving relief in affliction
bedding made of two layers of cloth filled with stuffing and stitched together
a freedom from financial difficulty that promotes a comfortable state
examples: he had all the material comforts of this world

results.definition: a feeling of freedom from worry or disappointment
assistance, such as that provided to an enemy or to a known criminal
examples: it gave comfort to the enemy

results.definition: satisfaction or physical well-being provided by a person or thing
examples: a padded chair was one of the room's few comforts
